article_title: Big Ideas From The Forbes Healthcare Summit

article_metadata.description: The Forbes Healthcare Summit in New York last week brought together very senior people across the U.S. healthcare spectrum: CEOs of big insurance companies, R&D heads of top pharma companies, CEOs of major medical centers, and CEOs of a few of the key upstarts: AthenaHeath, ASAP Urgent Care, Rothman Institute MinuteClinic, etc. Here's a summary of the big ideas that emerged.
article_metadata.author: Todd Hixon
